document_data.name: Hold Undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hold undead''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] and [[invocation]] [[spell]] from the [[protection sphere]] that enabled the caster to ''[[hold person|hold]]'' several corporeal [[undead]].
document_data.Effects: The caster could ''hold'' 1â€“4 undead in place for up to five minutes provided they were within a cube measuring {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} to each side. The ''hold'' would be broken if the undead was attacked in any manner.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] the [[priest]]'s [[holy symbol]] to cast.
document_data.History: A [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] named [[Prug]] developed this spell in {{YearlinkConvert|2188|NY}}.
